analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/24/0x125a3e254c54d8cd2e02a08ad4acf7be5232921c.sol:
	Contract C0xToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0x125a3e254c54d8cd2e02a08ad4acf7be5232921c.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/24/0x125a3e254c54d8cd2e02a08ad4acf7be5232921c.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
